title: В кругу друзей
overview: Famous guests come to the studio with their kind and sweet pets and talk about what surprises their four-legged and feathered family members give them every day.Viewers can expect exclusive video reports and advice from experts - groomers, zoologists, hippotherapists, dog trainers, animal psychologists, lawyers and even animal fashion experts. Also, TV viewers will have the opportunity to shelter a pet left without an owner.
